Nothing has gone well since the evacuation.
I mean, look at me. I'm a blacksmith, not a sentry. But I'm stuck up here on watch, without even a pet to keep me company.What can I do to help?

Maybe you could help me.

Why don't you... gather some Veridia Root for me! My hunger is dragging me down."Really? Really?"
Zeuk had been keeping watch for some time, and can asked if you could collect his favorite food, Veridia Root. He then asked if you could help other people in the area

Haha! Nicely done! Now I can snack away the hours.

I've seen a few other people struggling from here. In particular, those high elf stonemasons can use some better supplies.
How are you coming with those Verida Roots? It seems silly for you to come all the way up here empty handed.

Oh, thank you, kind stranger!

We'll put these stones to good use!
We don't have enough stone to build even the smallest wall. Can't you help us?
Thank you! I'll certainly put these to good use. How did you know I needed help?
I'll never be done at this rate. Say, you wouldn't happen to have any Xermetal Ore, would you?

You really are a good helper!

I'm very grateful you could take the time to help us out like this. It's hard to go out gathering when you've got so much to do.

Please, take this as compensation for all your hard work.
